title: UK cyber security : total market size 2010 to 2017
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Market size in million GBP. In total the number of data points it has is 8.
Overall Market size in million GBP has increased over the Year.
Market size in million GBP is slightly increasing from 2010 to 2017.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2013 and 2014.
Maximum Market size in million GBP, about 3489.0 was reported at Year 2017
The lowest Market size in million GBP, of value 2407.0 was reported at Year 2010
